rule-5-8-a.test_description: Building is located in climate zone 4A and includes a space that has residential occupancy type and is  coditioned based on heating capacity of the HVAC system that servies that servies the parent zone. The baseline below-grade wall C-factor for the zone is established correctly.

standard.ruleset_reference: G3.1 #5 (b) Opaque assemblies used for new buildings, existing buildings, or additions ... shall match the appropriate assembly maximum U-factors in Tables G3.4-1 through G3.4-8:
standard.rule_description: Baseline below-grade walls shall match the appropriate assembly maximum C-factors in Tables G3.4-1 through G3.4-8

rule-5-8-b.test_description: Building is located in climate zone 4A and includes a space that has residential occupancy type and is  coditioned based on cooling capacity of the HVAC system that servies that servies the parent zone. The baseline below-grade wall C-factor for the space is established correctly.

standard.ruleset_reference: G3.1 #5 (b) Opaque assemblies used for new buildings, existing buildings, or additions ... shall match the appropriate assembly maximum U-factors in Tables G3.4-1 through G3.4-8:
standard.rule_description: Baseline below-grade walls shall match the appropriate assembly maximum C-factors in Tables G3.4-1 through G3.4-8

rule-5-8-c.test_description: Building is located in climate zone 4A and includes a space that has residential occupancy type and is  coditioned based on heating capacity of the HVAC system that servies that servies the parent zone. The baseline below-grade wall C-factor for the zone is not established correctly.

standard.ruleset_reference: G3.1 #5 (b) Opaque assemblies used for new buildings, existing buildings, or additions ... shall match the appropriate assembly maximum U-factors in Tables G3.4-1 through G3.4-8:
standard.rule_description: Baseline below-grade walls shall match the appropriate assembly maximum C-factors in Tables G3.4-1 through G3.4-8

rule-5-8-d.test_description: Building is located in climate zone 4A and includes a space that has nonresidential occupancy type and is  coditioned based on heating capacity of the HVAC system that servies it. The baseline below-grade wall C-factor for the zone is established correctly.

standard.ruleset_reference: G3.1 #5 (b) Opaque assemblies used for new buildings, existing buildings, or additions ... shall match the appropriate assembly maximum U-factors in Tables G3.4-1 through G3.4-8:
standard.rule_description: Baseline below-grade walls shall match the appropriate assembly maximum C-factors in Tables G3.4-1 through G3.4-8

rule-5-8-e.test_description: A zone is semiheated based on heating and cooling capacity of the HVAC system that servies that servies the parent zone. Building is located in climate zone 4A. The baseline below-grade wall C-factor for the zone is established correctly.

standard.ruleset_reference: G3.1 #5 (b) Opaque assemblies used for new buildings, existing buildings, or additions ... shall match the appropriate assembly maximum U-factors in Tables G3.4-1 through G3.4-8:
standard.rule_description: Baseline below-grade walls shall match the appropriate assembly maximum C-factors in Tables G3.4-1 through G3.4-8

rule-5-8-f.test_description: A zone is semiheated based on heating and cooling capacity of the HVAC system that servies that servies the parent zone. Building is located in climate zone 4A. The baseline below-grade wall C-factor for the zone is not established correctly.

standard.ruleset_reference: G3.1 #5 (b) Opaque assemblies used for new buildings, existing buildings, or additions ... shall match the appropriate assembly maximum U-factors in Tables G3.4-1 through G3.4-8:
standard.rule_description: Baseline below-grade walls shall match the appropriate assembly maximum C-factors in Tables G3.4-1 through G3.4-8
